languages.text: Завершив последнее странствие с Лорд-капитаном, Абеляр Версериан с высочайшего дозволения Вольного Торговца покинул пост сенешаля и встал во главе своего многочисленного семейства.
Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.
languages.original_text: Завершив последнее странствие с Лорд-капитаном, Абеляр Версериан с высочайшего дозволения Вольного Торговца покинул пост сенешаля и встал во главе своего многочисленного семейства.

traits.locale_text: Having completed the last journey with the Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian by gracious permission of the Rogue Trader has left the position of Seneschal and took the helm of his large family.
Having completed the last journey with the Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian by gracious permission of the Rogue Trader has left the position of Seneschal and took the helm of his large family.
Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, by gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left the post of the Seneschal and took the helm of his large family.

Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.
Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森追随着他的领主舰长，完成了最后的航行。在行商浪人的恩准下，他卸下了总领的职位，着手指引他庞大的家族。
languages.original_text: Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森追随着他的领主舰长，完成了最后的航行。在行商浪人的恩准下，他卸下了总领的职位，着手经营他的庞大家族。

languages.text: Nachdem Abelard Werserian seine letzte Reise mit seinem Lord Captain abgeschlossen hatte, verließ er mit freundlicher Genehmigung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} den Posten des Truchsesses und übernahm das Ruder seiner großen Familie.
languages.original_text: Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem Abelard Werserian seine letzte Reise mit seinem Lord Captain abgeschlossen hatte, verließ er mit freundlicher Genehmigung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} den Posten des Truchsesses und übernahm das Ruder seiner großen Familie.

languages.text: Après avoir effectué son dernier voyage aux côtés de {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}, Abélard Werserian obtint l'autorisation de renoncer à son poste de sénéchal afin de se consacrer à la gouvernance de sa grande famille.
languages.original_text: Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir effectué son dernier voyage aux côtés de {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}, Abélard Werserian obtint l'autorisation de renoncer à son rôle de sénéchal afin de se consacrer à la gouvernance de sa grande famille.

languages.text: Tras completar su último viaje con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, Abelard Werserian, gracias al generoso permiso de su Comerciante Independiente, dejó su puesto de Senescal para tomar las riendas de su extensa familia.
languages.original_text: Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.

traits.locale_text: Tras completar su último viaje con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, Abelard Werserian, gracias al generoso permiso de su Comerciante Independiente, dejó el puesto de Senescal para tomar las riendas de su extensa familia.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンとの最後の旅を終えたアベラルド・ウェルザリアンは、自由開拓者の寛大な許可を得て家令長の座を辞し、自身の大家族を統べることとなった。
languages.original_text: Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンとの最後の旅を終えたアベラルド・ウェルザリアンは、自由開拓者の寛大な許可を得て家令長の座を辞し、自身の大家族を統べることとなった。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'la son yolculuğunu tamamlayan Abelard Werserian, Hür Tacir'in yüce gönüllülüğüyle verdiği müsaade sayesinde Seneşallik görevinden ayrıldı ve geniş ailesinin dümenine geçti.
languages.original_text: Having completed his last journey with his Lord Captain, Abelard Werserian, with the gracious permission of the Rogue Trader, left his post as Seneschal and took over the helm of his large family.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'la son yolculuğunu tamamlayan Abelard Werserian, Hür Tacir'in yüce gönüllülüğüyle verdiği müsaade sayesinde Seneşallik görevinden ayrıldı ve geniş ailesinin dümenine geçti.
